awsMarketplace:AgreementType.description: Filters access by the type of the agreement

awsMarketplace:PartyType.description: Filters access by the party type of the agreement

awsMarketplace:ProductId.description: Filters access by product id for AWS Marketplace RedHat OpenShift products in the RedHat console. Note: This condition key only applies to the RedHat console, and using it will not restrict access to products in AWS Marketplace

catalog:ChangeType.description: Filters access by the change type in the StartChangeSet request
